description: This determines whether the application will allow users to log in using CAS.
This determines whether the application will only allow users to log in using CAS. This has lower precedence than "use_shibboleth_only" when both are enabled.
This determines whether the application will allow users to log in using Shibboleth.
This determines whether the application will only allow users to log in using Shibboleth. This has higher precedence than "use_cas_only" when both are enabled.
